title: Banana Oat Muffins Recipe
description: These oatmeal banana muffins make a deliciously sweet, healthy breakfast and are made with bananas and rolled oats. They're a tasty grab-and-go treat.

Muffin Recipes Banana Oat Muffins 4.5 (1,644) 1,370 Reviews 292 Photos An oatmeal banana muffin that's a healthy and delicious morning treat! Submitted by Karen Resciniti Updated on October 31, 2024 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 292 292 292 292 Prep Time: 15 mins Cook Time: 20 mins Total Time: 35 mins Servings: 12 Yield: 12 muffins Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 12 servings 1 ½ cups unbleached all-purpose flour 1 cup rolled oats ½ cup white sugar 2 teaspoons baking powder 1 teaspoon baking soda ½ teaspoon salt 1 egg ¾ cup milk ⅓ cup vegetable oil ½ teaspoon vanilla extract 1 cup mashed bananas Directions Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C). Line a 12-cup muffin tin with paper liners. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Combine flour, oats, sugar, baking powder, soda, and salt in a medium bowl; set aside. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Beat egg lightly in a large bowl. Whisk in milk, oil, and vanilla. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Stir in mashed bananas. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Add the flour mixture and stir until just combined. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Spoon batter into the prepared muffin cups, filling each 3/4 full. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Bake in the preheated oven until tops spring back when lightly pressed, 18 to 20 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 2,628 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 200 Calories 8g Fat 30g Carbs 4g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 12 Calories 200 % Daily Value * Total Fat 8g 10% Saturated Fat 1g 6% Cholesterol 17mg 6% Sodium 296mg 13% Total Carbohydrate 30g 11% Dietary Fiber 2g 6% Total Sugars 12g Protein 4g 7% Vitamin C 2mg 2% Calcium 72mg 6% Iron 1mg 7% Potassium 137mg 3% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Banana Oat Muffins 01 of 292 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 292 Photo by  Woadrunner 03/24/2025 A keeper! I didn’t really measure the bananas, just did what looked like two cups worth. Followed the rest of the recipe exactly. They turned out great. My daughters loved them! 03 of 292 Photo by  cocoa butter 02/07/2025 Easy to follow Crowd-pleaser Family favorite Loved this as a base recipe. I used half the amount of sugar and flour (also used whole wheat flour instead) and double the amount of bananas and vanilla (our banana tree has been very generous with fruit this month). Accidentally added around 3/4 cup of oil so they were a smidge oily but otherwise they baked up great at the 18 minute mark. They were softer than I imagine the original recipe to be but yum nonetheless. I also topped them with chopped walnuts, almonds, and chocolate chunks.I will definitely be making a variation of this again. 04 of 292 Photo by  sarah 01/28/2025 A keeper! Family favorite Great recipe! I used butter instead of oil, 2/3 cup of soaked chopped dat s instead of sugar and less 1/4 cup of milk. So a bit different, but was a great base! 05 of 292 Photo by  Will G 12/12/2024 A keeper! I substituted the same amount of buttermilk for the milk, topped each one with a blueberry and streusel oat topping .. these are the best use of on hand ingredients and over ripe bananas ever! 06 of 292 Photo by  James Murday 04/08/2024 A keeper! Great flavors Easy to follow Worth the effort Crowd-pleaser Family favorite The recipe worked out well. Light flavor. I split the sugars between white and brown.I might suggest adding an extra banana or two for flavor. 07 of 292 Photo by  Naomi Dennise 01/24/2024 Delicious with the following additions based on others reviews: 1/2 tsp nutmeg, 2 tsp cinnamon. 1 tbsp maple syrup, 2 tsp almond extract (only because I'm out of vanilla), swapped out oil for applesauce, added 1/4 cup of plain yogurt for more moisture, and added chocolate chips to half the batch. Turned out very well, kids approve :) 08 of 292 Photo by  Sarah Jorgensen 01/17/2024 I used quick oats, buttermilk, and blueberries. Delicious! 09 of 292 Photo by  Kennya Briones 01/15/2024 These were easy to make and taste great. I added cinnamon to mine and substituted 1/2 a cup of flour for whole wheat. You have to try this recipe. So good! 10 of 292 Photo by  Margaret Halliday 10/24/2023 I exchanged the vegetable oil for apple sauce….tasted great….I think I prefer a little bit more moisture. I didn’t use paper cups…..sprayed and dusted with flour. I doubled the recipe. I’ll ll be making this recipe again👍 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Banana Muffins 5,115 Ratings Banana Crumb Muffins 14,709 Ratings Sarah's Banana Bread Muffins 1,072 Ratings Banana Oat Muffins with Sour Cream 333 Ratings Health Nut Blueberry Muffins 878 Ratings Healthy Banana Chocolate Chip Oat Muffins 211 Ratings Mocha Chocolate Chip Banana Muffins 739 Ratings Whole30 Banana Bread Drop Muffins 68 Ratings Gluten-Free Vegan Banana Bread Muffins 3 Ratings Banana Muffins with a Crunch 350 Ratings Fluffy Glazed Banana Muffins Lighter Banana Muffins 560 Ratings Delicious Banana Vegan Muffins (Sugar Free) 17 Ratings Gluten-Free Banana Oatmeal Muffins 3 Ratings Banana Nut Crunch Muffins (Gluten-Free) 10 Ratings Banana Cranberry Nut Muffins 1 Rating Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
